QuestData.Title: The Wayward Dead
QuestData.Description: The process of mass conjuring, as the mogu are doing here, is not without byproduct. Some spirits arrive too distraught or unruly to be harnessed, so they are confined and left to wander until their desperation leaves them more malleable.$B$BI suspect the mogu have such a holding area somewhere nearby, likely guarded by spiritclaws.$B$BPlease, take my staff again and use it to collect these wayward spirits. You needn't fight them - present the staff and they should be drawn in.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Staff of Pei-Zhi to absorb 10 Wayward Ancestors in the Terrace of Ten Thunders.
QuestData.CompletionText: We mustn't forsake the wayward dead.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. I will take them with me into the nether.
